flavorText: Their language may be a cacophonous agglomeration of chittering snorts and mad barking, but the message they send is all too clear.

foreignData.flavorText: Ihre Sprache mag nur eine misstönende Aneinanderreihung von Schnatterlauten sein, aber ihre Botschaft ist unmissverständlich.
foreignData.name: Störende Unholde
foreignData.text: {2}{R}: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl greift in diesem Zug an, falls möglich.

foreignData.flavorText: Su lenguaje puede ser una aglomeración cacofónica de gorjeos y ladridos, pero el mensaje que envían es muy claro.
foreignData.name: Demonios abucheadores
foreignData.text: {2}{R}: La criatura objetivo ataca este turno si puede.

foreignData.flavorText: Leur langage se limite peut-être à une cacophonie de piaillements et d'aboiements déments, mais leur message reste on ne peut plus clair.
foreignData.name: Fielleux perturbateurs
foreignData.text: {2}{R} : La créature ciblée attaque ce tour-ci si possible.

foreignData.flavorText: Il loro linguaggio può anche essere un agglomerato cacofonico di sbuffi cinguettanti e abbaiare folle, ma il messaggio che trasmettono è fin troppo chiaro.
foreignData.name: Immondi Disturbatori
foreignData.text: {2}{R}: Una creatura bersaglio attacca in questo turno, se può farlo.

foreignData.flavorText: 奴らの言語は断続的な鼻息と狂ったような叫びの耳障りな塊だが、その言わんとすることは極めて明確だ。
foreignData.name: やじる悪鬼
foreignData.text: {2}{R}：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。このターン、それは可能なら攻撃する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — デビル

foreignData.flavorText: 콧방귀와 짖는 소리뿐이지만, 그들이 무엇을 말하려는 지는 분명하다.
foreignData.name: 조롱하는 악령들
foreignData.text: {2}{R}: 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 가능하면 이 턴에 공격한다.

foreignData.flavorText: A língua deles pode ser um aglomerado cacofônico de urros e grunhidos insanos, mas a mensagem é muito clara.
foreignData.name: Demônios Importunos
foreignData.text: {2}{R}: A criatura alvo ataca neste turno se estiver apta.

foreignData.flavorText: Хотя из их уст вырывается какофонический поток щелчков, фырканья и безумного лая, то, что они хотят сказать, предельно ясно.
foreignData.name: Говорливые Демоны
foreignData.text: {2}{R}: целевое существо атакует в этом ходу, если может.

foreignData.flavorText: 他们的语言虽只是吱叫鼻息与疯狂吼叫的不和谐音组合，但传达的讯息可鲜明无比。
foreignData.name: 诘难邪鬼
foreignData.text: {2}{R}：目标生物本回合若能攻击，则必须攻击。

foreignData.flavorText: 他們的語言雖只是吱叫鼻息與瘋狂吼叫的不和諧音組合，但傳達的訊息可鮮明無比。
foreignData.name: 詰難邪鬼
foreignData.text: {2}{R}：目標生物本回合若能攻擊，則必須攻擊。

name: Heckling Fiends
originalText: {2}{R}: Target creature attacks this turn if able.

rulings.text: The creature’s controller still decides which player or planeswalker the creature attacks.

If, during a player’s declare attackers step, a creature is tapped, is affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t attack, or hasn’t been under that player’s control continuously since the turn began (and doesn’t have haste), then it doesn’t attack. If there’s a cost associated with having a creature attack, the player isn’t forced to pay that cost, so it doesn’t have to attack in that case either.

text: {2}{R}: Target creature attacks this turn if able.
